level.text: Section 7-852 shall apply on the first day of the month 120 days following April 4, 2001.
Section 7-853 shall apply to all health benefit plans issued or reissued beginning on the first day of the month 120 days following April 4, 2001.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-276
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-276, see notes following § 7-851.
